name: Board
responsibilities: Represents the current state of the board
Can tell others about the state of the board

name: Player
responsibilities: Prevents repeat selection of a square

name: Location
responsibilities: Represents a location on the board with a row and column

name: Main Method
responsibilities: Starts a new game with 2 players and a blank board

name: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
responsibilities: Asks each player to select a position on the board
Update board with player's choice if square is free, else tell user to try again
Displays outcome when game is over
